QuestData.Title: Dalar Dawnweaver
QuestData.Description: Take the codex and travel north to the Sepulcher. Once there, find Dalar Dawnweaver. Dalar is a former archmage of the Kirin Tor. Surely he will be able to bring down the protective wards surrounding this codex and pry its secrets loose.$B$BHurry, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Ambermill Codex to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher in Silverpine Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: The Dark Lady requires my expertise? Well of course! Give it here, $g boy:girl;.
